Text:
The program ran a bit late and the timer switched off just before the end, but it only missed one track. I do not see the program repeated, so I will upload what I got.

It is worth downloading, just  for the nostalgia.

I have  a copy of that last missing performance, and it was the best one !!
I'll upload it later today.

Like you, I love the nostalgia and the upload is much appreciated. I only caught the last bit of this last night and you gave me and others a chance to save and enjoy rare footage of songs that are timeless.

BBC 4, keep doing what you're doing

Thanks again.
